std.value: Excuse me, I can’t find my way to the Grand Theatre. Could you please tell me how I can get there? Which direction should I turn to?
std.ai: Excuse me, I can’t find my way to the Grand Theatre. Could you please tell me how I can get there? Which direction should I turn to?

std.value: Excuse me, do you know the way to the Grand Theatre? Which direction should I turn to?
std.ai: Excuse me, do you know the way to the Grand Theatre? Which direction should I turn to?

std.value: Do you know how I can get to the Grand Theatre? Which direction should I turn to?
std.ai: Do you know how I can get to the Grand Theatre? Which direction should I turn to?

question.ask: Questions 1~2 You’ve got lost on the way to the Grand Theatre. Ask a passerby two questions for help.
question.keywords: can’t find way Grand Theatre tell how can get there Which direction turn|do know way Grand Theatre Which direction turn|Do know how can get Grand Theatre Which direction turn

std.value: How did you prepare the English speech contest? Did you meet anyone you know in the contest?
std.ai: How did you prepare the English speech contest? Did you meet anyone you know in the contest?

std.value: Congratulations! How are you going to celebrate it? Did you ask our teacher’s help when you were preparing the contest?
std.ai: Congratulations! How are you going to celebrate it? Did you ask our teacher’s help when you were preparing the contest?

std.value: Are you going to take part in the next contest? How are you feeling now?
std.ai: Are you going to take part in the next contest? How are you feeling now?

question.ask: Questions 3~4 Your friend, Tom, has won the first prize in the English speech contest. Ask him two questions about it.
question.keywords: How prepare English speech contest meet anyone know contest|Congratulations How going celebrate ask teacher’s help when preparing contest|going take part next contest How feeling
